New Records: Zack Wheeler achieved his 100th career win
Zack Wheeler lowered his ERA to 2.63, leading the NL
Zack Wheeler has the best WHIP in the NL with 0.98
Zack Wheeler leads the NL in innings pitched (167 2/3) and starts (27)
Key Match Events: Zack Wheeler pitched seven scoreless innings
Edmundo Sosa and Trea Turner each hit home runs
The Phillies won their 80th game of the season
Post-Match Reflections: Zack Wheeler expressed pride in his 100th career win
Phillies manager Rob Thomson praised Wheeler's consistency
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zack Wheeler has held opposition to two runs or fewer in 16 of his past 18 starts
Zack Wheeler has dominated the Braves this season with a 0.95 ERA
Zack Wheeler's performance has been a key factor in the Phillies' NL East lead
